pages.text: $(b)Obelisks$() are powerful ritual structures that generate naturally in the world. They contain ancient magic and can be harvested for shards.

pages.title: Finding Obelisks
pages.text: $(l)Locating Obelisks:$()$(br2)• Search for tall stone pillars in the world$(br)• Use an $(violet)Obelisk Compass$() to locate them$(br)• They appear in various biomes$(br)• $(#)Boss Obelisks$() are larger and more powerful

pages.title: Harvesting Shards
pages.text: $(l)Getting Obelisk Shards:$()$(br2)1. Craft a $(violet)Chisel$() (Obsidian + Stick)$(br)2. Shift-click the obelisk$(br)3. Collect $(violet)Obelisk Shards$()$(br2)Shards are used in advanced equipment recipes!

pages.title: Obelisk Types
pages.text: $(l)Obelisk Variants:$()$(br2)$(b)Normal Obelisk$()$(br)Standard ritual structure$(br2)$(b)Active Obelisk$()$(br)Powers active rituals$(br2)$(b)Boss Obelisk$()$(br)Powerful variant with unique properties
